title: What we’re hearing entering Week 11: Kyler Murray’s future, Giants’ next steps, flawed playoff contenders
content: Where will Murray play next season? What's next for the Giants? Which 2026 free agents are worth watching? We have the latest.

title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus each team's non-QB MVP at midseason
content: Updated Power Rankings ahead of Week 11. Plus, we picked every team's MVP -- not including quarterbacks.

title: Ex-NFLer Brown gets $25K bail, GPS monitoring
content: Former NFL receiver Antonio Brown will be released on $25,000 bail and must wear a GPS ankle monitor while he faces an attempted murder charge in Florida, a judge ordered Wednesday.

title: McDaniel 'indebted' to Quinn over sobriety fight
content: Mike McDaniel said he is "forever indebted" to Dan Quinn because the Commanders coach helped steer him toward sobriety.

title: Titans' Sneed indicted for failing to report felony
content: Titans cornerback L'Jarius Sneed was indicted by a grand jury Tuesday in Dallas County, Texas, on a misdemeanor charge of failure to report a felony.

title: Coen: Premature if Hunter stays two-way player
content: Jaguars head coach Liam Coen said it's too early to start wondering about Travis Hunter's future as a two-way player.

title: Sources: Giants set to start Winston vs. Packers
content: The Giants are expected to start quarterback Jameis Winston against the Packers, sources told ESPN, turning to him over Russell Wilson after rookie Jaxson Dart suffered a concussion against the Bears.

title: Eagles CB Alexander stepping away from football
content: Former Pro Bowl cornerback Jaire Alexander has decided to step away from football in order to focus on getting right physically and mentally amid his ongoing recovery from offseason knee surgery, a league source confirmed to ESPN on Tuesday.

title: L.A. Games to crown fastest woman on first day
content: The full schedule for the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics has been released, with the women's 100-meter final in track on the first official day and a "Super Saturday" with 26 finals across 23 sports.

title: Green questions Warriors' commitment to winning
content: After the Warriors were blown out by the Thunder on Tuesday for their sixth consecutive road loss, Draymond Green was asked to describe the difference between how they finished last season following the Jimmy Butler trade and what is happening now.

title: Inside Ty Simpson's journey from Bama benchwarmer to Heisman hopeful
content: After a long wait and a rough start, the Crimson Tide QB has his team poised for a national title bid.

title: For the family of WWE legend Eddie Guerrero, his shadow still looms large
content: Twenty years after his death, the legendary WWE superstar still exists in the memories of his loved ones.

title: The top 25 NFL free agents for 2026: Ranking players in line to get PAID this offseason
content: We listed the NFL's top 25 pending free agents -- including Daniel Jones and George Pickens -- and gave intel on who might return to their current team.

title: Better than the Babe? Mays? Bonds? How Ohtani's five-year run compares to MLB legends
content: The Dodgers' two-way star is on the verge of winning his fourth MVP award in five years. Where does his run rank among the all-time best?

title: Inside the Thunder's pursuit of a dynasty
content: Oklahoma City's identity was built on being an up-and-coming team. Now it has a ring and massive expectations.

title: Inside an unbelievable $241M week for Austin Reaves and the Los Angeles Lakers
content: The Lakers guard is helping to convince LeBron James to stay, but playing so well that it might cost to keep him.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Giannis dominates for Bucks, Pistons take the East
content: NBA insiders break down this week's power rankings and where all 30 teams stack up after an exciting stretch of games.

title: Are the Utah Mammoth and Anaheim Ducks really this good?
content: Both clubs are in the playoff mix this season after missing in 2024-25. Can they sustain their hot starts?

title: 'That's all it's ever been ... is doubt': Braden Smith is chasing a title -- and the NBA
content: Delivering the Boilermakers' first national championship could go a long way toward Smith's future in the NBA.

title: Men's Bracketology: Houston claims No. 1 overall seed, Georgetown cracks the field
content: The Cougars top the first in-season edition of our projections. See the 67 other teams that made the cut.

title: What makes Tarik Skubal and Paul Skenes the best pitchers on the planet
content: Here's what separates the Cy Young favorites from other aces, according to those who watch them most.

title: UFC 322 preview: Where have all the champ-champs gone?
content: Nine years ago this weekend, Conor McGregor became the first fighter to hold two UFC belts simultaneously.

title: NWSL awards: Temwa Chawinga is MVP, but silly season is upon us
content: Temwa Chawinga is the league's dominant player and will rightly be named MVP. As for the rest of the NWSL awards? That's all up for debate.

title: How Premier League teams are borrowing NFL plays for set piece success
content: Set piece mania has taken over the Premier League but it seems that teams are taking plays from the NFL. Here's what they have learned.

title: Why Colts players say Carlie Irsay-Gordon is unlike any other NFL owner
content: Irsay-Gordon is forging a unique identity as the Colts' owner, from the sidelines to buying fans a round of drinks in a Berlin bar.

title: Vikings coach Kevin O'Connell lives with mistakes so J.J. McCarthy can learn
content: O'Connell has continued his aggressive playcalling despite some rough moments from the first-year starting QB.

title: Facts to guide your Week 11 feelings about C.J. Stroud, Derrick Henry and more
content: Liz Loza gives you reasons to embrace the possibilities of big games from unlikely sources (and vice versa).

title: Matchup rankings: Upgrade Rico Dowdle, downgrade Baker Mayfield
content: The most and least favorable matchups for this week's NFL games at four key positions: QB, RB, WR and TE.

title: Why fire Nico Harrison now? Could Anthony Davis get traded? Five looming questions in Dallas
content: Everything we know about the Dallas Mavericks firing Harrison, and where Cooper Flagg and the Mavs go from here.

title: 7 storylines to follow during the boys' early signing period
content: Upcoming commitments, surprising first-year head coach starts -- and what's going on with No. 1 Tyran Stokes?

title: 2026 girls' recruiting class rankings: Top 10 entering the early signing window
content: Ahead of the early signing window, which 10 programs are already ahead with the class of 2026? Let's start with USC.

title: From Umar to Muzammil: Who are the six docs behind Red Fort blast; all you need to know
content: A trans-state white-collar terror module involving doctors, clerics, and professionals, linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind, was unearthed after a high-intensity explosion near Delhi's Red Fort. Joint operations led to the arrest of seven suspects and the recovery of over 2,900 kg of explosives and firearms.

title: Islamabad blast: 8 Sri Lanka cricketers return from Pak; second ODI in doubt
content: Pakistan won the first ODI by six runs at the same venue on Tuesday. Sri Lanka is also scheduled to play a triangular series with Pakistan and Zimbabwe after the ODI series. In 2009, the Sri Lankan team bus was attacked by gunmen on the way to the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore for the second Test.

title: Delhi blast: Explosion threw victims against wall; autopsies reveal ruptured lungs
content: A deadly car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday evening killed at least 12 people. Post-mortem reports reveal severe injuries, including ruptured organs and multiple fractures, indicating a high-intensity blast. The National Investigation Agency has taken over the terror-related incident probe.

title: More power for Munir: Pak passes 27th amendment; army chief to be 1st CDF
content: Pakistan's National Assembly has passed a significant constitutional amendment. This bill grants extensive powers to the army chief, Asim Munir, and reshapes the country's judicial system. The legislation, which received overwhelming support, aims to consolidate control over key defense and judicial institutions. It establishes a new federal constitutional court and elevates the army chief's authority over all three military branches.

title: Delhi blast: Govt declares explosion near Red Fort terror incident; passes resolution
content: The government has officially declared the car blast near Delhi's Red Fort a "terrorist incident," vowing swift justice for perpetrators and sponsors. Prime Minister Modi visited injured victims, while the NIA launched a dedicated probe into the attack, suspected to be the work of a Jaish-e-Mohammad module. The explosion tragically claimed twelve lives.

title: Trump eases pressure on China: Export ban delayed; markets breathe easier
content: The Trump administration has postponed a significant export control rule targeting Chinese companies for a year, a key concession in the recent U.S.-China trade truce. This move eases tensions, allowing American tech exporters a reprieve from complex compliance. While a temporary detente, the rule's potential return in 2026 signals ongoing scrutiny.

title: IPL trade: MI knock KKR for Mayank Markande, conversations in final stages | Exclusive
content: With the IPL retention deadline approaching, Mumbai Indians are close to finalising a trade for Kolkata Knight Riders’ leg-spinner Mayank Markande. The move will see the 28-year-old return to his debut franchise after seven years. MI have also shown interest in Rahul Chahar, another former player, as they look to strengthen their spin attack ahead of IPL 2026.

title: Hardik fitness update: Star all-rounder set to play domestic, comeback date revealed
content: Hardik Pandya is set to mark his long-awaited return by representing Baroda in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy later this month. The all-rounder, recovering from a quadriceps injury, is nearing match fitness at the BCCI Centre of Excellence and could feature before India’s ODI series against South Africa, beginning November 30.

title: AI training: Wikipedia co-founder sends message to tech companies; says 'pay us for training AI'
content: Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales is urging tech giants like Google and OpenAI to pay for using the encyclopedia's content to train their large language models. He argues that the immense traffic from AI bots strains Wikipedia's resources, which are funded by public donations, making it unsustainable to support for-profit companies.

title: India's big rare earth move: Govt revises royalty rates; to fight China's monopoly
content: India is set to boost its critical mineral production by rationalizing royalty rates for graphite, caesium, rubidium, and zirconium. This move, approved by the Union Cabinet, aims to reduce import dependency and strengthen supply chains, especially as China imposes export restrictions.

title: IND vs SA | Team India star released from squad for first Test; BCCI explains why
content: All-rounder Nitish Kumar Reddy has been released from India's squad for the first Test against South Africa to join the India A team. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate confirmed the decision, citing team balance and expected conditions for the opening game. Dhruv Jurel will feature in the playing XI alongside Rishabh Pant.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..
content: Meta's AI chief, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, likening the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' – hands-on experimentation with AI – to gain a significant future economic advantage, much like early programmers. This rapid, iterative approach is key to understanding and maximizing AI's potential.

title: Bihar exit polls: Axis My India predicts win for NDA; setback for MGB likely
content: Exit polls predict a strong return for Nitish Kumar's NDA in Bihar, with opposition Mahagathbandhan falling short. Projections show the NDA securing a comfortable majority, while the Mahagathbandhan struggles to reach the required numbers. High voter turnout across phases is seen by all major parties as a positive sign for their prospects.

title: 'Discreet silence': Chidambaram slams Centre over 'homegrown terror'
content: Former Home Minister P. Chidambaram criticized the Centre's silence on homegrown terrorism following the Delhi bomb blast. He highlighted the arrest of educated professionals in the blast, reiterating his long-held concern about Indian citizens becoming terrorists. Chidambaram's remarks echo his past warnings during the Operation Sindoor debate, which drew criticism from the BJP.

title: Surya Bonaly loses all medals to Vegas thieves while caring for her mother
content: Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole all her career medals while she was in Minnesota caring for her mother, who is also battling cancer. The burglary at her Las Vegas home revealed broken windows and destroyed security cameras, with surveillance footage indicating multiple individuals were involved over several days.

title: 'Already done': Ashwin drops bombshell; reveals MI have secured LSG star Shardul Thakur in trade
content: Ashwin made the statement on his YouTube channel 'Ash Ki Baat', adding another development to the pre-auction conversations, especially with reports that CSK are considering a trade involving Ravindra Jadeja and Sam Curran in exchange for Sanju Samson from Rajasthan Royals (RR). The video clip is being widely shared on social media.

title: IND vs SA | India coach sounds warning - 'Hopefully, we've learned from NZ series'
content: India's assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate highlighted lessons from last year's home Test loss to New Zealand as the team prepares to face South Africa.  Acknowledging the challenge of spin, he expressed confidence in the team's plans to counter it.  South Africa's potent spin attack, proven in Pakistan, promises a thrilling contest.

title: NPS myths busted! Why it is one of the smartest retirement plans - explained
content: National Pension System (NPS) myths are debunked, highlighting its flexibility, tax efficiency, and disciplined long-term growth potential.  Despite misconceptions about inflexibility and complexity, NPS offers control over investments, significant tax benefits, and automatic adjustments for age, making it a smart retirement choice.

title: Countering Trump: India approves export promotion scheme; check details
content: The Union Cabinet has approved a Rs 25,060 crore Export Promotion Mission to consolidate existing schemes and support sectors facing tariff challenges. This six-year initiative, from FY 2025-26 to FY 2030-31, will offer integrated sub-schemes like Niryat Protsahan and Niryat Disha to boost MSME exports.

title: Trump ‘knew about the girls’ at Epstein’s house: Democrats make bombshell claim
content: New emails released by Democrats suggest Jeffrey Epstein claimed Donald Trump knew about underage victims and had spent hours with one at his home. Epstein also allegedly told Ghislaine Maxwell that Trump was a "dog that hasn't barked." These messages raise fresh questions about the former president's connection to the convicted sex offender.

title: Delhi blast: EAM Jaishankar meets US secy Rubio; what was discussed
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio offered condolences for the Red Fort car blast. External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar met with Rubio. They discussed strengthening bilateral cooperation in trade and supply chains. The leaders also exchanged views on global issues including the Ukraine conflict and the Middle East situation. The meeting occurred during the G7 Foreign Ministers' Meeting in Canada.

title: Bus plunges into ravine after collision with truck in Peru; 37 killed
content: A bus crash in Peru on Wednesday resulted in at least 37 fatalities and 24 injuries when the vehicle plunged into a 200-meter ravine after colliding with a truck. The accident occurred on the Panamericana Sur highway, with the bus traveling from Chala to Arequipa.

title: Bomb scare: Delhi's IGIA gets threat mail; AI Express flight evacuated
content: A bomb threat email to IndiGo triggered a high alert at Delhi's IGI Airport and other locations, later declared a hoax. Separately, an Air India Express flight from Mumbai to Varanasi made an emergency landing due to a mid-air bomb threat, with all passengers safely evacuated. These incidents follow a deadly car blast near Delhi's Red Fort.

title: Lakers vs Thunder: Preview, lineup, injuries, prediction & how to watch
content: The Oklahoma City Thunder, boasting an impressive 10-1 record, are set to host the Los Angeles Lakers (8-3) in a highly anticipated NBA clash. This marks the first of four regular-season matchups between these storied franchises. Fans can catch the action live on Wednesday, November 12, 2025, at 9:30 p.m. ET, with broadcast details provided.

title: Make America Smart Again? Trump channels Vivek, skewers MAGA rhetoric
content: Trump’s struggle to reconcile his anti-immigrant politics with America’s dependence on foreign talent exposes the core MAGA paradox — a movement built on fear of outsiders now begging them to keep its factories, tech, and economy alive.

title: 'White-collar terror module, red car': What's emerging in Delhi blast probe - key points
content: A "white-collar terror module" is under investigation following a deadly blast at Delhi's Red Fort, which killed 12. Clues include a missing red Ford EcoSport and links to Al Falah University, where the suspected bomber was an assistant professor. A car dealer has been detained as police trace the explosive-laden Hyundai i20's ownership.

title: MAGA grills Trump over H-1B shift: ‘POTUS turned his back on Americans'
content: President Trump's recent remarks on H-1B visas have ignited a backlash from his MAGA base. He suggested the U.S. needs more skilled foreign workers, arguing that Americans lack specialized expertise for certain technical roles. This stance contradicts his administration's previous actions and has led to accusations of betrayal from supporters who feel he's prioritizing foreigners over unemployed Americans.

title: Delhi blast: Doc fired for terror links 'taught' at Al-Falah University; manhunt on
content: A Faridabad-based private university, Al-Falah, is facing increased scrutiny following reports linking its staff to a recent blast near Delhi's Red Fort. The university confirmed the detention of two doctors by investigating agencies, while also denying any connection to the incident beyond their employment.

title: Giants turn to Jameis Winston over Russell Wilson after Jaxson Dart injury
content: The New York Giants are turning to Jameis Winston as their starting quarterback in Week 11 against the Green Bay Packers. Rookie Jaxson Dart remains in concussion protocol, and veteran Russell Wilson has been moved to third-string. Interim head coach Mike Kafka’s decision signals a shift in direction after the team’s 2-8 start and Brian Daboll’s firing.

title: Ranji Trophy: How words of wisdom from Dravid, Jadeja inspired Brar; takes 6-fer vs C'garh
content: After years of frustration, Harpreet Brar finally made his first-class debut for Punjab at 30. Guided by words of encouragement from Rahul Dravid and Ravindra Jadeja, the left-arm spinner revived his red-ball ambitions.

title: IND vs SA | ‘WTC final next year’! India coach’s bold message before first Test
content: India's assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate views the upcoming Test series against South Africa as a vital step towards the World Test Championship final. He acknowledges South Africa's recent form but emphasizes India's determination to send a strong statement at home. The series marks South Africa's first Test tour to India since 2019.

title: Kabul plays Trump card? Taliban may curb trade with Pak; looking for alternatives
content: Afghanistan's Taliban government is seeking alternative trade routes through Central Asia as border closures with Pakistan cripple commerce, costing nearly $200 million monthly. Accusing Islamabad of politically motivated restrictions and exploiting traders, Kabul urges strengthening ties with Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, and Turkmenistan amid collapsed bilateral talks and escalating cross-border hostilities.

title: IPL: How many players can a franchise retain before auction? Retention rules explained
content: Teams must complete their retention list by November 15. They can continue to make trades or player swaps before the auction, which is expected in mid-December.The trading window for IPL teams opened on June 4, a day after the 2025 final, and will stay open until one week before the 2026 auction

title: Morgan Geekie hits back at fan mocking Bruins’ celebration of Pastrnak’s 400th
content: Boston Bruins star David Pastrnak reached a significant career milestone scoring his 400th NHL goal. The team's enthusiastic celebration drew criticism from a fan online. Bruins player Morgan Geekie defended the team's unity. This event underscores the Bruins' strong team chemistry and individual achievements. The milestone also boosted team morale and contributed to their winning streak.

title: Delhi blast: TMC MP raises issue in House panel; chairperson refuses discussion - report
content: A parliamentary committee on home affairs declined to discuss a deadly car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station, despite the incident claiming 12 lives and raising security concerns. A TMC MP's attempt to raise the issue was reportedly shut down by the chairperson, even as disaster management officials were present.

title: Trump asks pardon for Netanyahu in corruption cases; sends letter to Israeli President
content: US President Donald Trump has urged Israeli President Isaac Herzog to consider pardoning Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who faces corruption charges. Trump labelled the prosecution 'political' and 'unjustified.' Herzog's office confirmed receipt of the letter, stating a formal pardon request must follow established procedures. Netanyahu denies all allegations.

title: IND vs SA | Cape Town carnage: When tons from Sachin & Azharuddin couldn't save India
content: As India and South Africa prepare for their upcoming Test series, the legendary 222-run partnership between Sachin Tendulkar and Mohammad Azharuddin in Cape Town 1997 evokes memories of India's fighting spirit. This iconic stand, forged under immense pressure, showcased India's fighting spirit, even as they fell to a mountain first innings deficit against the hosts.

title: The 13 lives of Surinder: 19 years on, closure for Koli, none for Nithari
content: Convicted serial killer Surinder Koli, infamous for the Nithari murders, is set for release after a Supreme Court acquittal in his final case. Having spent 19 years in jail, Koli's journey saw a dramatic shift from volatile behavior to quiet meditation. He will now begin a new life after his dramatic legal journey concludes.

title: 'No contact': Shaheen's brother breaks silence; kin struggle to believe terror link
content: Family members of arrested doctor Shaheen Sayeed expressed shock and disbelief over her alleged links to a terror module responsible for the Red Fort car blast. Her brother and former husband described her as a loving person, unaware of any suspicious activities. Investigators claim Sayeed headed Jaish-e-Mohammed's women's recruitment wing.

title: Delhi blast: PM Modi meets victims at LNJP Hospital; to hold key security meet soon
content: Prime Minister Modi, returning from Bhutan, visited Delhi car blast victims, assuring justice for perpetrators. He vowed to uncover the conspiracy, stating those responsible "won't be spared." Home minister Amit Shah also directed officials to "hunt down each and every culprit" behind the explosion that claimed at least 12 lives near the Red Fort.

title: Sania Mirza confesses being a single mom is ‘very hard’
content: Filmmaker Farah Khan and tennis star Sania Mirza opened up about life, friendship, and the challenges of single motherhood. Mirza shared her struggles, while Khan discussed societal views on hardship and the normalization of divorce. Khan lauded Mirza's strength as a single parent, recounting a moment of panic where she rushed to support her friend.

title: ED seizes ₹21.71-crore assets linked to accused in $20-million crypto fraud case
content: The ED investigation revealed that the trusted websites were spoofed in such a way by search engine optimisation that when the website would be searched, the spoofed one would appear at the top

title: Vigilant civic society partnered with courts to drive progress in gender justice: CJI
content: The CJI was delivering the 30th Justice Sunanda Bhandare Memorial Lecture on ‘Justice for All: Building a Gender Equal and Inclusive India’

title: Al-Falah University distances itself from accused doctors; police raids on campus, nearby villages
content: University denies allegations that its laboratories were being used to store explosive materials; police seize documents, devices from Imam’s quarters; conduct door-to-door searches for explosives, suspects

title: NIA conducts searches across five States in Al-Qaeda Gujarat terror conspiracy case
content: The searches were carried out on premises linked to various suspects and their associates in West Bengal, Tripura, Meghalaya, Haryana, and Gujarat. Several digital devices and  documents were seized

title: SC to examine if farmers are evading satellite surveillance to burn stubble
content: Amicus curiae claims that agriculturists burn crop residue after surveillance satellite passes; court seeks latest report on stubble burning from Punjab and  Haryana

title: India, Botswana announce cheetah translocation pact; President Murmu says ‘will take good care of them’
content: The two heads of State will preside over an event where five of the eight captured cheetahs will be released into a quarantine facility at Mokolodi nature reserve, marking the symbolic handing over of the hunting cats to India by Botswana as part of ‘Project Cheetah’ and under a mutual initiative for wildlife conservation

title: Child safety: Seven departments in Karnataka issue joint circular
content: With an aim to curb teen pregnancies, child abuse, and child marriages, seven departments have issued a joint circular asking authorities concerned to initiate a slew of measures

title: Trinamool Congress accuses ECI of ‘favouring’ BJP during SIR in West Bengal
content: TMC claims BJP benefits from ECI notice allowing appointment of BLAs from different polling booths within same Assembly constituency; BJP raises concerns about political affiliations of BLOs

title: Enumeration forms distributed to 73% voters in second phase of SIR across 12 States: ECI
content: Lakshadweep has topped the list covering all but one voter — 57,812 of 57,813 voters or nearly 100%; Goa is a close second having covered 99.99%; Kerala is lagging behind other States with only 49.55% coverage; West Bengal and Tamil Nadu, which witnessed protests against the SIR, have covered 88.8% and 78.09% voters respectively

title: Over 600 detained in 500 search operations across Kashmir: police
content: The crackdown on suspects in Kashmir was stepped up after the Red Fort blast in New Delhi on November 10, which left 13 civilians dead

title: Death toll in Bilaspur train tragedy hits 12
content: An initial probe conducted by the Railways reportedly found that the crew of the MEMU passenger train failed to control it at the red signal

title: IISc study finds that anthropogenic changes threaten survival of Eastern Himalayan birds
content: The team tagged birds with lightweight aluminium rings and revisited the same sites annually to track their survival and changes in body mass

title: Five years on, Hoskerehalli overpass to open by weekend, trials begin
content: The 400-metre project, which began in August 2020 at a cost of ₹30 crore, and is often dubbed the ‘brother’ of the Ejipura Flyover, was originally scheduled for completion in 2022

title: Keep tabs on guests, install CCTV cameras, Hyderabad police tell owners of hotels and lodges
content: Verification of guest identities, maintenance of visitor records and installation of CCTV cameras were among the key points discussed

title: Terrorism destroyed aspirations of youth in past three decades: J&K L-G
content: These remarks came after the role of three doctors from Kashmir came under the scanner for “terror links” in the recent past

title: State govt. staff assaulted by four men in Yadgir
content: The victim has been identified as Anjali Girish Kambanoor, a Second Division Assistant working in the Social Welfare Department

title: TB incidence in India fell by 21%, almost twice the global decline of 12%, says WHO report
content: India’s TB mortality rate has decreased from 28 per lakh population in 2015 to 21 per lakh population in 2024, reflecting significant progress in reducing deaths due to TB

title: Bombay High Court criticises govt. over malnutrition deaths in Maharashtra’s tribal regions
content: The Bench comprising Justices Revati Mohite Dere and Sandesh Patil was hearing a series of petitions filed over the infant deaths due to malnourishment in Amravati district’s Melghat region, a tribal-dominant area, where chronic malnutrition has existed for years

title: BDA allots alternate sites to 784 Arkavathy Layout allottees in NPKL
content: Allottees have been running from pillar to post to get possession of their sites after paying up thier full amount; many have been waging decade-long legal battles and paying property tax for sites they didn’t have for two decades

title: Congress to prepare chargesheets against LDF-ruled local bodies
content: A Congress insider says the BJP poses a more persistent and immediate threat to UDF’s electoral prospects. “Heavy loss of anti-incumbency votes to the BJP would possibly cost the Congress more than the LDF”, he stated.

title: Rift in BJP over candidate selection in Palakkad
content: The BJP State leadership has not approved the district committee’s candidate list for the municipality as it has left out the current municipal chairperson, vice-chairman

title: Gujarat ATS raids Hyderabad doctor’s residence in ‘terror conspiracy’ probe
content: The searches, conducted at his house in Fort View Colony, Upparpally, are a part of the ongoing probe into the plot to develop ricin, a lethal toxin derived from castor beans

title: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu presents new clothes to housing beneficiaries
content: Naidu participates in house-warming ceremonies of a few of them at Devgudipalle in Annamayya district

title: 12 Days Before Blast, Suspects Got i20's Pollution Checked, Then Parked It
content: New angles are emerging in Monday's explosion near Red Fort, Delhi, as the investigation into the case intensifies. The explosion at 6.52 pm Monday killed nine people and injured 20 others.

title: Delhi Blast's Telegram Link: How Messaging App Became Playground For Terrorists
content: The less moderated online spaces provided by Telegram have also enabled extremists to reach wider masses and do self-promotion, brand development, and propaganda dissemination.

title: Slow-Moving Traffic, Then Big Explosion: CCTV Footage Of Delhi Red Fort Blast
content: Video footage of the bomb blast that ripped through Delhi's Red Fort surfaced today, amid an ongoing investigation into the terror attack that claimed nine lives earlier this week.

title: Bilaspur Train Accident: Probe Reveals Loco Pilot Didn't Clear Aptitude Test
content: At least eleven people were killed and 20 were injured in one of the most horrific train accidents in recent memory when the Gevra-Bilaspur MEMU passenger train rammed a stationary freight train near Lal Khadan, close to Bilaspur's Gatora station.

title: Sample Taken From Delhi Blast Site More Powerful Than Ammonium Nitrate: Sources
content: Not just ammonium nitrate, high-grade explosives were also used in the blast that occurred near the Red Fort in Delhi, an official from the Forensic Science Laboratory said.

title: Adani Cement To Deploy World's 1st 'RotoDynamic Heater' To Reduce Emissions
content: Adani Cement and Finnish company Coolbrook on Wednesday announced to deploy world's first commercial RotoDynamic Heater' to advance cement decarbonisation at the Boyareddypalli Integrated Cement Plant in Andhra Pradesh.

title: "Act Of War": Government Sources Say "Op Sindoor On" After Delhi Blast
content: In a warning to perpetrators of the Delhi terror blast, government sources reiterated that any terror operation on Indian soil will be considered an act of war.

title: PM Modi, Bhutan's Fourth King Discuss Bilateral Ties, Cultural Bonds
content: On Tuesday, Prime Minister Modi and Bhutanese King Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck held extensive discussions covering a wide spectrum of cooperation, including energy, capacity building, connectivity, technology, defence, and security.

title: 'US Doesn't Have Enough Talent': Trump Defends H-1B Visa Plan After Fee Hike
content: US President Donald Trump appears to have softened his stance on his administration's aggressive immigration reforms, saying America needs to bring in foreign talent for certain fields.

title: Red Fort Blast Live Updates: Delhi Blast Suspects Recced Red Fort In January, Sources Say
content: Delhi Blast Live Updates: The anti-terror agency, NIA, has taken over the probe and begun investigations at the scene.

title: 'Rs 58 Crore, Global Links': Police Probe One Of Biggest Digital Arrests
content: The Maharashtra Cyber Department probing the Rs 58 crore digital arrest case in Mumbai has found an international network with links extending to Hong Kong, China and Indonesia, an official said on Tuesday.

title: NCP "Never Misused Power Nor Acted Arrogantly": Ajit Pawar
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, who heads the ruling NCP, on Tuesday said people continue to repose faith in his party because of its commitment to development and welfare-oriented politics.

title: 'No Changes': Google Denies Removing Western Sahara Border For Morocco Users
content: The dotted lines illustrating the border between Western Sahara and Morocco, indicating the former's disputed territory status, have never been visible to people using Google Maps in the latter, the company told AFP on Tuesday.

title: Bill To Allow 8 Republicans To Seek Damages For Capitol Riot Probe
content: Legislation moving through Congress that would end the government shutdown in the US would also allow eight Republican senators to seek hundreds of thousands of dollars in damages for the capitol riot probe done by the Biden administration.

title: "Foreign Students Good For US": Trump's U-Turn On MAGA's Immigration Agenda
content: In a major U-turn on his immigration agenda, US President Donald Trump has advocated for allowing foreign students to study in American universities.

title: Delhi Blast Victim's Family Wanted Funeral In Hometown Meerut, Wife Refused
content: Mohsin, a resident of Uttar Pradesh's Meerut, was killed in Monday's car bomb blast near Red Fort, Delhi. An argument broke out over the place of his burial.

title: Car Used In Delhi Bomb Blast Was First Seen At Connaught Place, Mayur Vihar
content: The white Hyundai i20 car that exploded near Delhi's Red Fort, killing nine people, was first seen at Connaught Place and Mayur Vihar hours before the blast.

title: i20 Car Used In Delhi Blast Didn't Move For 12 Days, Then Doctor Panicked
content: The suspected suicide bomber, Dr Umar Nabi drove the car out of the college campus on the morning of the attack, November 10, allegedly out of panic.

title: Noel Tata's Son Neville Appointed As Trustee Of Sir Dorabji Tata Trust
content: Tata Trusts Chairman Noel Tata's son Neville was on Tuesday inducted as a trustee on the Sir Dorabji Tata Trust.

title: Samples Of 2 Different Types Of Explosives Recovered From Delhi Blast Site
content: The Forensic Science Laboratory (FSL) team investigating the car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort has recovered two live cartridges and samples of two different types of explosives on Tuesday, sources said.

title: Spiraling Ferrari unfairly points finger at Hamilton, Leclerc
content: Ferrari is underperforming in 2025, and while its drivers are sharing their frustrations, chairman John Elkann is placing the blame at their feet.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye Wolves' João Gomes
content: Manchester United are considering a move for Wolverhampton Wanderers midfielder João Gomes. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Avalanche remain Stanley Cup favorites, Anaheim gains in West
content: The Avalanche and Panthers are current Stanley Cup favorites while the Ducks continue their surprise rise.

title: CISF foils smuggling attempt, seizes ₹1.4 crore worth of electronic goods at Hyderabad airport
content: Seized items include 65 Iphone 17 Pro Max, eightDrone DJI Air 3, four Video Game (Nintendo Switch 2), two laptops, 20 Apple watches and a Google Pixel watch

title: Scuffle between two inmates at Chanchalguda Central Prison
content: The two were reportedly acquainted from earlier periods of incarceration, and the clash is believed to have stemmed from an old enmity

title: Sugarcane farmers continue to stage protest in Mudhol, other places
content: Some factories start crushing for the season even as an attempt led by Minister Thimmapur to negotiate with the protesting growers fails

title: Jagan resorting to cheap politics over PPP model of developing medical colleges, says Andhra Pradesh Health Minister Satya Kumar
content: Questioning the YSRCP chief’s understanding of the PPP model, the Minister says the government will retain full control over admission, reservation, fee regulation, and administration in all the 10 medical colleges proposed to be set up in the model

title: PM Modi-led Cabinet condemns blast near Red Fort as “terrorist incident”, vows swift justice
content: The Union Cabinet in a resolution said that the the country “has witnessed a heinous terror incident, perpetrated by anti-national forces”

title: Two exit polls point to NDA win; Axis My India predicts RJD as single-largest party
content: The Axis My India Exit Poll predicted that the NDA would be ahead of the Mahagathbandhan in Bihar, but the RJD would emerge as the single-largest party when results for the Assembly polls are announced on Friday

title: YSRCP organises ‘Praja Garjana’ against privatisation of medical colleges
content: The protest, along with the one-crore signature campaign, demonstrates the State’s unified stand against the government’s decision, the party says

title: Project employees’ colony seeks relief from land regularisation hurdles in Guntur
content: Residents of Srisailam Colony in Vengalayapalem urge the State government to remove their plots from the prohibited list and end years of uncertainty over ownership and civic services

title: NHAI told to expedite work as contractor seeks time till March next to complete bypass road
content: The Deputy Commissioner says that the contractor has been entrusted with widening the 30.60-km Hubballi-Dharwad Bypass Road into six lanes

title: Andhra Pradesh grabbing investor attention due to Speed of Doing Business and Chandrababu Naidu’s leadership, says IT Minister Lokesh
content: Stating that investments worth $120 billion have come to the State in the last 16 months, he says the government is set to sign 410 agreements, with a potential to generate jobs to an estimated 7.50 lakh people, in the upcoming CII Partnership Summit

title: Cyclone Montha leaves cauliflower farmers in distress in Krishna district
content: Heavy rains triggered by the cyclone damage standing crops across Penamaluru mandal, with tenant farmers reporting severe losses and officials assessing the extent of damage

title: Minister expresses ire over pending works at Veligonda project
content: Nimmala Rama Naidu inspects project works in Prakasam district for the second time in a week with a team of irrigation experts

title: Now, Karnataka CM’s camp says CLP decides leadership issue
content: Amid speculations over a possible leadership change after completion of the mid-term of the Congress government in Karnataka, some loyalists of Chief Minister Siddaramaiah appear to be bargaining hard for his continuation in the post for the full five years and they have begun claiming that the Congress Legislature Party will take a decision on the matter and it will be later endorsed by the party high command

title: Kerala local body polls: State Election Commission comes out with video explainer on differences between it and Election Commission of India
content: SEC, which handles local body elections, first brought out such a clarification just before 2024 Lok Sabha elections after getting flooded with phone calls seeking poll information

title: Heisman Trophy race: Who can still challenge Indiana's Fernando Mendoza?
content: Fernando Mendoza is the only player to have multiple weeks listed as the Heisman favorite . a year ago, Travis Hunter sat at -400 before finishing the season with the trophy . his odds were never enticing to buy but my prediction remains the same .

title: Man who hurled petrol-filled bottles at Chennai Raj Bhavan gets 10-yr jail term
content: the 39-year-old hurled two petrol-filled bottles at the Raj Bhavan gate . a special court for NIA cases in Poonamallee found him guilty and imposed 10-year jail term on him . the incident occurred on Oct 25, 2023 .

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Chris Chelios lists Malibu beachfront house for sale at almost $60 million
content: If you've got plenty of cash to spare and are a  Chris Chelios  fan, we've got some very good news for you. The Hockey Hall of Famer, who spent most of his 26-year NHL career with the  Montreal Canadiens ,  Chicago Blackhawks  and  Detroit Red Wings , listed his mansion in Malibu, California, for sale at the end of October for a  cool $59,999,950 . According to Zillow, that's actually a discount from the original listing in 2024 at $67,500,000. The house has four bedrooms and five bathrooms and is 3,795 square feet. It's on the waterfront in Malibu's exclusive Paradise Cove neighborhood right off Pacific Coast Highway. Photos of the property on Zillow show a well-lit interior with high ceilings and a phenomenal view of the ocean. Perhaps most unusually, the property also features a self-contained second house -- a cabana-style building on the sand. Chelios bought the house in 2001 for $5.25 million, per Zillow.

title: Which first-month shock teams will stay red hot or ice cold?
content: a month into the NHL season, the playoff race is already shifting in unexpected ways . many of the highest postseason chances belong to the usual suspects, as do the lowest (sorry, San Jose Sharks) some are the property of rising teams surging ahead of schedule . some of these early sources of curiosity look built to last .

title: Reranking all 68 Power 4 QBs: Who rose and who fell after two months

title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Murphy, Vogt take Manager of the Year awards

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: Women's college basketball Power Rankings: The 16 best teams so far
content: the first edition of ESPN's women's college basketball Power Rankings for 2025-26 . the top four teams in our initial rankings are the programs that went to the Final Four last season . of that group, UCLA has the most impressive victory so far: 73-59 over fellow top-10 team Oklahoma on Monday .

title: Logo threes to golf tees: Caitlin Clark's Annika Pro-Am highlights
content: caitlin Clark is competing in the LPGA's Annika pro-am for the second consecutive year . the 2024 WNBA Rookie of the Year competed last year alongside Nelly Korda and played the back nine holes . here are the best moments from Clark at the event .

title: 🏈 Bottom 10: BYU makes dreaded appearance!
content: the red Raiders take over deep in BYU territory after a muffed punt by Parker Kingston . "It's Getting Real in the Whole Foods parking lot," DJ Spider Here at Bottom 10 Headquarters . the calendar hangs on the front of our refrigerator .

title: Away from the pressures of Madrid, can Vinícius find a spark playing for Brazil?
content: "he's not his father. I'm not his brother. I just want to be his coach," ancelotti says . the former coach says he wants to be the coach of the national team . he says his personal life is his own and is not to everyone's liking .
